thread.title: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops
thread.title_full: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops

title: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops
text:
Updated: 8:22 a.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 | Posted: 8:05 a.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops ﻿ FILE - This is a Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 file photo of British singer Sam Smith as he performs on stage during the V Festival 2015 at Hylands Park in Chelmsford, Essex, England. The choice was shrouded in mystery and denials, but British singing sensation Sam Smith has surfaced as the singer of the theme song for the new James Bond film, “Spectre.” He had denied the rumors, but came clean Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015, tweeting that taking part in the Bond film was a high point in his remarkable, multiple-award winning career. (Photo by Jonathan Short/Invision/AP, File) Related > More By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Sam Smith's the latest singer to pen a theme song for the James Bond franchise, and fans of both the crooner and the spy saga are getting their first look at the new movie. 
Smith's theme, "Writing's on the Wall," was posted to YouTube Sunday. 
Haunting strings and a powerful piano, found in many Bond songs accompany clips from the new "Spectre" film, teasing Bond fans before its November release.
